body:
What is your Favorite  thing about Avicus?

Is it the Community?
Is it The Gamemodes

Make sure to explain why ;)
body_tagged:
What is your Favorite  thing about Avicus?

Is it the Community?
Is it The Gamemodes

Make sure to explain why ;)
title: Your Favorite Thing about Avicus?

replies.body:
Hands down, it's the community.
Also, the staff here are so friendly and approachable, it makes it really easy to talk to them about anything official or casual.

I feel like on other servers, the staff are very mechanical. But here I really get along with the staff and am very humbled by how good my relationship between the Moderators and I really is.

The community is filled with people willing to help and pass on knowledge to newer Avicus players.

It's not something every Minecraft community does.
replies.body_tagged:
Hands down, it's the community.
Also, the staff here are so friendly and approachable, it makes it really easy to talk to them about anything official or casual.

I feel like on other servers, the staff are very mechanical. But here I really get along with the staff and am very humbled by how good my relationship between the Moderators and I really is.

The community is filled with people willing to help and pass on knowledge to newer Avicus players.

It's not something every Minecraft community does.

replies.body:
Yes :D - or no?

First, I 'talked' [wrote] to Sunrise, but he said I broke the rules and nobody won't unban me before I write an appeal.

Second try: I appealed at support@avicus.net, they didn't unban me^[cuz .... etc.]

Third try: I dealt with Zeus. He would have unbanned me if, I won't break any rules in the next eleven days.

Yes, but I could live without Avicus <3 So I ban evaded...









...AND GOT BANNED AGAIN :DD:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:DD:D:DD

nvm, I have to wait I guess...
